alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 5:57PM CDT until June 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 700 PM CDT/600 PM MDT/. * At 557 PM CDT/457 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Medicine Lake, or 40 miles northwest of Mullen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Indian Hill, Marsh Flat, Speckel Meir Lake, Highway 97 crossing Big Creek and Sevenmile Hill. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 83 and 106. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
